full_text: Form FS-510 (English) (4-63) Page 2 21. I am submitting the following personal documents in support of and as part of my application Birth certificate Military record Promise of employment Police certificate(s) Evidence of support or own resources Medical record(s) X Other (describe) Divorce Certificate Marriage Certificates 22. Name and present residence of my wife/husband is (Give maiden name of wife) Mr. Armin Klein, 855 Alexis Nihon Blvd., St. Laurent 9, Quebec. 23. The names and addresses of my children under 21 years of age are 24. The names of members of my family who are immigrating with me are Mr. Armin Klein, husband 25. The name and address of my father is (If deceased, so state, giving date) Deceased, Hungary, 1940. LAJOS KLEIN 26. The maiden name and address of my mother is (If deceased, so state, giving date) Deceased, 1944. 2SENI ROSENBAUM 27. The name and address of my next of kin in my home country is Mrs. Beatrice Binsky, 1967 Cote Vertu, St. Laurent 9, Quebec. 28. Since my sixteenth birthday my places of residence for 6 months or more have been City or town Province Country 1920 Dates (From-To) Calling or occupation Nagy Halasz Szabolc Hungary Oct. 20, 1904 to June 1928. none Montreal Quebec Canada Aug. 16, 1928 to No.v. 1950. none Wingham Ontario Canada Nov. 1950 to Sept.1958. none Montreal Quebec Canada Sept.1958 to Present Saleslady 29. Since my sixteenth birthday I am or have been a member or affiliate of the following political, professional, vocational or social organizations Type of membership and Name and address Dates (From-To) office held, if any 30. I speak, read, write the following languages (Include your native language) Language Speak Read Write Hungarian yes yes yes English yes yes yes Yiddish yes no no Hebrew no yes no 31. I have previously been in the United States during the following periods (Give year and type of visa or status) (If never, so state) short visito Never
